clinical_study.brief_title: Extensive Stage Sclc Patients Who Were Benefit From First-line Treatment Accept Temozolomide Maintain Therapeutic
clinical_study.official_title: Lobaplatin Combined With Etoposide for First-line Treatment in Extensive Stage Sclc Then Benefit Patients Follow up Temozolomide Maintain Therapeutic

brief_summary.textblock: This study evaluates temozolomide maintain therapeutic efficacy and safety in extensive stage SCLC who has clinical benefit from etoposide combined Los platinum (EL) scheme in the first line treatment.

detailed_description.textblock: According to the etoposide combined Los platinum (EL) plan administration, every cycle was 21 days, a total of four cycle. The patients who was clinical benefit directly from EL scheme in the first line treatment accept temozolomide maintenance therapy, 150mg / m2, oral D1-5. A period of 28 days, regular follow-up and evaluation of effectiveness, safety and quality of life.

primary_outcome.measure: Progression-Free Survival in the first line of chemotherapy
primary_outcome.description: The first day of treatment to the date that disease progression is reported

secondary_outcome.description: The first day of treatment to death or last survival confirm date
The ratio between the number of responders and number of patients assessable for tumor response.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: the first date of treatment to 30 days after the last dose of study drug, assessed up to 6 months
secondary_outcome.description: Treatment-related adverse events are assessed by common terminology criteria for adverse events (CTCAE) V4.0.

clinical_study.condition: Extensive Stage Small Cell Lung Cancer

arm_group.description: Lobaplatin combined with etoposide for first-line treatment of extensive stage small cell lung cancer,then clinical benefit patients for temozolomide maintain therapeutic.This study have only one arm which temozolomide maintain at dose of 150mg/m2 D1-5 Q4W.
